qas.question: How many Grammys has Beyonce won total with and without Destiny's Child?

context: Beyoncé has won <a0_0><a5_0><a9_0>20<a9_0/><a0_0/> Grammy Awards<a5_0/>, both as a solo artist and member of Destiny's Child, making her the second most honored female artist by the Grammys, behind <a1_0>Alison Krauss<a1_0/> and the most nominated woman in Grammy Award history with <a2_0><a6_0><a10_0>52<a10_0/><a2_0/> nominations<a6_0/>. <a11_0>"Single Ladies (Put a Ring on It)"<a11_0/> won Song of the Year in <a7_0>2010<a7_0/> while "Say My Name" and "Crazy in Love" had previously won Best R&B Song. Dangerously in Love, B'Day and I Am... Sasha Fierce have all won Best Contemporary R&B Album. Beyoncé set the record for the most Grammy awards won by a female artist in one night in 2010 when she won <a3_0>six<a3_0/> awards, breaking the tie she previously held with Alicia Keys, Norah Jones, Alison Krauss, and Amy Winehouse, with <a8_0>Adele<a8_0/> equaling this in 2012. Following her role in <a12_0>Dreamgirls<a12_0/> she was nominated for Best Original Song for "Listen" and Best Actress at the Golden Globe Awards, and Outstanding Actress in a Motion Picture at the NAACP Image Awards. Beyoncé won <a4_0>two<a4_0/> awards at the Broadcast Film Critics Association Awards 2006; Best Song for "Listen" and Best Original Soundtrack for Dreamgirls: Music from the Motion Picture.
